mapper.select: select ku0.nickname as userNickname, ku1.nickname as inviterNickname, kc.name as clubNickname from khl_club_invite kci left join khl_userinfo ku0 on kci.user_id = ku0.id left join khl_userinfo ku1 on kci.inviter_id = ku1.id left join khl_club kc on kci.club_id = kc.id where kci.user_id = #{userId};
